hu.trigary.iodine.api.gui.element.base

Interface GuiOrientable<T extends GuiOrientable<T>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the class implementing this interface
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    LinearGuiContainer, ProgressBarGuiElement

    public interface GuiOrientable<T extends GuiOrientable<T>>
    Represents a GuiElement that can be oriented both vertically and horizontally. Elements are in the horizontal orientation by default.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default boolean isHorizontalOrientation()
      Gets whether this element is in horizontal orientation.
      boolean isVerticalOrientation()
      Gets whether this element is in vertical orientation.
      T setOrientation(boolean vertical)
      Sets this element's orientation.

    • Method Detail

      • isVerticalOrientation

        @Contract(pure=true)
boolean isVerticalOrientation()
        Gets whether this element is in vertical orientation.
        Returns:
        true if this element is vertically oriented

      • isHorizontalOrientation

        @Contract(pure=true)
default boolean isHorizontalOrientation()
        Gets whether this element is in horizontal orientation.
        Returns:
        true if this element is horizontally oriented

      • setOrientation

        @NotNull
T setOrientation(boolean vertical)
        Sets this element's orientation.
        Parameters:
        vertical - whether the element should be vertically oriented
        Returns:
        the current instance (for chaining)
